card_text: For each player, the first time they do each of the following per turn, they draw 2 cards.$N●Special Summon 5 monsters with different Levels at the same time.$N●1 monster they control battles 5 times.$N●Activate a card or effect as Chain Link 5 or higher.$N●Roll 1 six-sided die, or toss a coin, 5 times.$N●Take damage that made their LP 500 or less.
